title: Blossom Bangles - Diamond Valiilu
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish for a rich luster. Adorned with sparkling
high-clarity diamonds in a brilliant cut.
features: Featuring a delicate floral design, these bangles showcase a modern take on traditional motifs. The floral clusters are meticulously set with diamonds, creating a dazzling sparkle. The openwork design allows light to pass through, enhancing the brilliance of the diamonds.
colors: Predominantly gold with the white brilliance of the diamonds.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to add a touch of elegance and sparkle. Suitable for both traditional Telugu functions like Pelli and contemporary events.
description: These bangles represent a seamless blend of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. The Hyderabadi Polish gives the gold a rich, warm tone. The diamond floral motifs are sure to turn heads. The design ensures comfortable wear and lasting beauty.
